channel.title: Looping at Certain Time
channel.description:
http://www.pastebin.com/zgedMeaa
I've got it to loop at a certain time. What I need to do now is make it so that when I start the script it will finish at 12AM Monday 4 weeks later. Also; When I run my current script (Pastebin Link) The output is this: 1.001495E7, There is letters and numbers. That doesn't seem right. Could you tell me why it doesn't show the 14.95% Interest added onto the 100k?

item.title: Looping at Certain Time
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Skyro:

How do I get the program to display the real number, not the weird number?

I gave you a valid thread that gave multiple examples of how to do this.

Read full topic

item.title: Looping at Certain Time
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

1.001495E7 = $10,014,950

The interest is off. Seems as if you’re doing .001495% of 10M.

Read full topic

item.title: Looping at Certain Time
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Skyro:

Would you be able to help me please?

When is the interest compounded? Weekly, Biweekly, daily, continuously? It is all simple maths. You had code that worked, build off of that.

Read full topic

item.title: Looping at Certain Time
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“Skyro, post:3, topic:515449”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=633703.msg4280092#msg4280092 date=1365415750]
The output is right, at least its a valid format for a number. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scientific_notation#E_notation
[/quote]
Okay, But I want it to be a number so I can see. Eventually this system will be implemented into my server so I’m going to need it fully working before I try.

Thanks.[/quote]
Read http://bytes.com/topic/java/answers/729198-printing-large-double-values-without-exponential-notation-java

Skyro:

Also, do you know how to make the interest get added in on a certain time? I want the withdraw (tax) to be taken out every 2 weeks on a monday 12am. and the deposit every 4 weeks on a monday 12am.

You will need 2 separate tasks. One that runs every 2 weeks, to take out the tax, and one that runs every 4 to deposit interest.

Read full topic

item.title: Looping at Certain Time
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

HcoJustin:

The output is right, at least its a valid format for a number. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scientific_notation#E_notation

Okay, But I want it to be a number so I can see. Eventually this system will be implemented into my server so I’m going to need it fully working before I try.

Thanks.

Also, do you know how to make the interest get added in on a certain time? I want the withdraw (tax) to be taken out every 2 weeks on a monday 12am. and the deposit every 4 weeks on a monday 12am.

Read full topic
